name: security-review
description: Perform a comprehensive security review of the codebase
content:
Perform a comprehensive security review of the code. Focus on:

## OWASP Top 10
- Injection vulnerabilities (SQL, NoSQL, OS command, LDAP)
- Broken authentication and session management
- Sensitive data exposure
- XML External Entities (XXE)
- Broken access control
- Security misconfiguration
- Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
- Insecure deserialization
- Using components with known vulnerabilities
- Insufficient logging and monitoring

## Code-Specific Checks
- Input validation and sanitization
- Output encoding
- Authentication mechanisms
- Authorization checks
- Cryptographic implementations
- Error handling (no sensitive data in errors)
- Secure communications (HTTPS, TLS)
- Secrets management (no hardcoded credentials)

Provide specific findings with file locations and recommended fixes.
